labels.name: accessibility
labels.description: A11y related issues with GitHub interfaces

labels.name: API
labels.description: Requests related to the GitHub developer API

labels.name: authentication
labels.description: SMS, 2FA, MFA, WebAuthn, passwords, and other related authentication schemes

labels.name: automation
labels.description: Reducing manual interactions and increasing productivity through automated processes

labels.name: cross referencing
labels.description: Interlinking between issues, prs, commits, etc

labels.name: migration
labels.description: Problems that make transferring from/to another service/GitHub difficult; also, see [Parity]

labels.name: parity
labels.description: Features that GitHub is missing, but competitors implement; also, see [Migration]
